00022 #region Usings
00023 using System.Collections.Generic;
00024 using System.Text;
00025 #endregion
00026 
00027 namespace Utilities.Profiler
00028 {
00032     public class ProfilerManager
00033     {
00034         #region Private Variables
00035         private static ProfilerManager _Manager=null;
00036         private List<ProfilerInfo>Profilers=null;
00037         #endregion
00038 
00039         #region Public Static Members
00040 
00041 
00042 
00043         public static ProfilerManager Manager
00044         {
00045             get
00046             {
00047                 if (_Manager == null)
00048                 {
00049                     _Manager = new ProfilerManager();
00050                 }
00051                 return _Manager;
00052             }
00053         }
00054         #endregion
00055 
00056         #region Constuctors
00057         private ProfilerManager()
00058         {
00059             Profilers=new List<ProfilerInfo>();
00060         }
00061         #endregion
00062 
00063         #region Public Functions
00064 
00065 
00066 
00067 
00068 
00069 
00070         public void AddItem(string FunctionName, int StartTime, int StopTime)
00071         {
00072             for(int x=0;x<Profilers.Count;++x)
00073             {
00074                 if (Profilers[x].FunctionName.Equals(FunctionName))
00075                 {
00076                     int Time=(StopTime - StartTime);
00077                     Profilers[x].TotalTime += Time;
00078                     if (Profilers[x].MaxTime < Time)
00079                         Profilers[x].MaxTime = Time;
00080                     else if (Profilers[x].MinTime > Time)
00081                         Profilers[x].MinTime = Time;
00082                     ++Profilers[x].TimesCalled;
00083                     return;
00084                 }
00085             }
00086             ProfilerInfo Info = new ProfilerInfo();
00087             Info.FunctionName = FunctionName;
00088             Info.TotalTime = Info.MaxTime = Info.MinTime = StopTime - StartTime;
00089             Info.TimesCalled = 1;
00090             Profilers.Add(Info);
00091         }
00092 
00097         public override string ToString()
00098         {
00099             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00100             Builder.Append("<table><tr><th>Function Name</th><th>Total Time</th><th>Max Time</th><th>Min Time</th><th>Average Time</th><th>Times Called</th></tr>");
00101             foreach (ProfilerInfo Info in Profilers)
00102             {
00103                 Builder.Append("<tr><td>" + Info.FunctionName + "</td><td>" + Info.TotalTime.ToString() + "</td><td>" + Info.MaxTime + "</td><td>" + Info.MinTime + "</td><td>" + ((double)Info.TotalTime / (double)Info.TimesCalled) + "</td><td>" + Info.TimesCalled + "</td></tr>");
00104             }
00105             Builder.Append("</table>");
00106             return Builder.ToString();
00107         }
00108         #endregion
00109 
00110         #region Private Classes
00111 
00112 
00113 
00114         private class ProfilerInfo
00115         {
00116             public string FunctionName;
00117             public int TotalTime;
00118             public int TimesCalled;
00119             public int MaxTime;
00120             public int MinTime;
00121         }
00122         #endregion
00123     }
00124 }
